languages.text: По приказу Лорд-капитана боевые орудия корабля выпускают несколько мощных залпов. Стоит снарядам достичь цели, как в ту же секунду астероидное поле охватывает череда беззвучных взрывов, что по спирали обходят крошечное эльдарское судно.

traits.locale_text: По приказу Лорд-капитана боевые орудия корабля выпускают несколько мощных залпов. Стоит снарядам достичь цели, как в ту же секунду астероидное поле охватывает череда мощных беззвучных взрывов — вокруг полыхающего пятна на месте взорванного корабля мгновенно появляется множество более мелких вспышек.

languages.text: On the Lord Captain's command, the ship's cannons fire several powerful salvos. As soon as the shots reach their mark, a cascade of soundless explosions erupts within the asteroid field and spirals around the Aeldari vessel.
languages.original_text: По приказу Лорд-капитана боевые орудия корабля выпускают несколько мощных залпов. Стоит снарядам достичь цели, как в ту же секунду астероидное поле охватывает череда беззвучных взрывов, что по спирали обходят крошечное эльдарское судно.

traits.locale_text: At the order of the Lord Captain, the voidship's cannons fire several devastating salvos. The very second the missiles reach their target, a cascade of powerful silent explosions erupts all around the asteroid field. The flaming debris of the destroyed voidship is haloed by the smaller flashes of the detonated mines.

On the Lord Captain's command, the ship's cannons fire several powerful salvos. As soon as the shots reach their mark, a cascade of soundless explosions erupts within the asteroid field and spirals around the Aeldari vessel.

On the Lord Captain's command, the ship's cannons fire several powerful salvos. As soon as the shots reach their mark, a cascade of soundless explosions erupts within the asteroid field and spirals around the Aeldari vessel.

On the Lord Captain's command, the ship's cannons fire several powerful salvos. As soon as the shots reach their mark, a cascade of soundless explosions erupts within the asteroid field and spirals around the Aeldari vessel.

languages.text: Sur ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, les canons du vaisseau tirent plusieurs salves puissantes. Dès que les projectiles touchent leur cible, une série d'explosions inaudibles se produit dans le champ d'astéroïdes en tournoyant autour du vaisseau aeldari.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's command, the ship's cannons fire several powerful salvos. As soon as the shots reach their mark, a cascade of soundless explosions erupts within the asteroid field and spirals around the Aeldari vessel.

traits.locale_text: Sur ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, les canons du vaisseau tirent plusieurs salves puissantes. Dès que les projectiles touchent leur cible, une série d'explosions inaudibles se produit dans le champ d'astéroïdes en tournoyant autour du vaisseau aeldari.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの指揮で、艦の大砲が数発の強力な一斉射撃を放つ。砲弾が命中すると同時に、小惑星帯の中で音もなく爆発が連鎖し、アエルダリ船を取り囲んだ。
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's command, the ship's cannons fire several powerful salvos. As soon as the shots reach their mark, a cascade of soundless explosions erupts within the asteroid field and spirals around the Aeldari vessel.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの指揮で、艦の大砲が数発の強力な一斉射撃を放つ。砲弾が命中すると同時に、小惑星帯の中で音もなく爆発が連鎖し、アエルダリ船を取り囲んだ。

languages.text: 在舰长大人的命令下，船上的宏炮进行了几轮强大的齐射。炮弹很快击中了目标，小行星带附近爆发了一连串无声的爆炸，爆炸区域蔓延在艾达灵族的舰船附近。
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's command, the ship's cannons fire several powerful salvos. As soon as the shots reach their mark, a cascade of soundless explosions erupts within the asteroid field and spirals around the Aeldari vessel.

traits.locale_text: 在舰长大人的命令下，船上的宏炮进行了几轮强大的齐射。炮弹很快击中了目标，小行星带附近爆发了一连串无声的爆炸，爆炸区域蔓延在艾达灵族的舰船附近。

languages.text: A la orden del Lord Capitán, los cañones de la nave disparan varias salvas potentes. En cuanto los disparos alcanzan su objetivo, una cascada de explosiones insonoras estalla en el campo de asteroides y gira en espiral alrededor de la nave Aeldari.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's command, the ship's cannons fire several powerful salvos. As soon as the shots reach their mark, a cascade of soundless explosions erupts within the asteroid field and spirals around the Aeldari vessel.

traits.locale_text: A la orden del Lord Capitán, los cañones de la nave disparan varias salvas potentes. En cuanto los disparos alcanzan su objetivo, una cascada de explosiones insonoras estalla en el campo de asteroides y gira en espiral alrededor de la nave Aeldari.

languages.text: Auf Befehl des Lord Captains feuern die Geschütze des Schiffs mehrere starke Salven ab. Sobald die Schüsse ihr Ziel erreichen, wird in dem Asteroidenfeld eine Kaskade geräuschloser Explosionen ausgelöst, die das Aeldari-Schiff umhüllen.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's command, the ship's cannons fire several powerful salvos. As soon as the shots reach their mark, a cascade of soundless explosions erupts within the asteroid field and spirals around the Aeldari vessel.

traits.locale_text: Auf Befehl des Lord Captains feuern die Geschütze des Schiffs mehrere starke Salven ab. Sobald die Schüsse ihr Ziel erreichen, wird in dem Asteroidenfeld eine Kaskade geräuschloser Explosionen ausgelöst, die das Aeldari-Schiff umhüllen.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın emriyle geminin topları güçlü salvolar ateşliyor. Atışlar hedeflerine varır varmaz asteroit bölgesinde sessiz sedasız bir patlama dalgası gerçekleşip Aeldari gemisinin etrafını sarıyor.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's command, the ship's cannons fire several powerful salvos. As soon as the shots reach their mark, a cascade of soundless explosions erupts within the asteroid field and spirals around the Aeldari vessel.
